title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
**Unleash the Power of Sound Anywhere with Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker**

Dive into the ultimate audio experience with the sleek and sophisticated Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, your perfect companion for any adventure. Whether you're jet-setting around the globe, embracing the great outdoors, or simply enjoying a poolside retreat, this portable speaker with a built-in microphone is engineered to impress.

**Key Features:**

- **Superior Sound Quality:** Experience deep bass, clear audio, and an immersive sound experience with Bose's exclusive technologies and a custom-engineered transducer.
- **PositionIQ Technology:** No matter how you set it up, PositionIQ technology ensures optimal audio performance for a consistent, lifelike sound experience.
- **Built to Brave the Elements:** With an IP67 waterproof rating, the SoundLink Flex is not just water-resistant, but it also floats! Dust, drop, corrosion, and UV light resistant, this speaker is ready for any challenge.
- **Stay Connected:** Voice prompts make Bluetooth pairing a breeze, and with a range of up to 30 feet, you can keep the music going without being tethered to your device.
- **Voice Assistant Ready:** Access Siri or Google Assistant with the press of a button and enjoy hands-free convenience at its best.
- **All-Day Play:** A powerful Lithium-ion battery offers up to 12 hours of playtime, and with the included USB-C cable, recharging is speedy and simple.
- **Bose Connect App:** Customize your listening experience, manage Bluetooth connections, and keep your speaker up-to-date with the intuitive Bose Connect App.
- **Compact and Portable:** Designed with a utility loop for secure attachment and a compact design that's easy to hold and store, the SoundLink Flex is your go-to speaker for on-the-go audio.
- **Stylish Durability:** Finished in a classic black color, this speaker not only sounds fantastic but looks great in any setting.

Whether you're making calls or controlling your smart home, the Bose SoundLink Flex is more than just a speakerâ€”it's your personal sound system that brings clarity and depth to every note. Don't settle for less; elevate your audio experience wherever life takes you with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Your journey deserves a soundtrack as vibrant as your adventures. Get yours today and step into a world of sound like never before!

**Unleash the Power of Sound Anywhere with Bose SoundLink Flex**

Elevate your listening experience to new heights with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate companion for audio enthusiasts on the go. Designed with a sleek black exterior, this portable powerhouse is more than just a speaker; it's an extension of your adventurous lifestyle.

**Immersive Audio That Moves With You**
The Bose SoundLink Flex is engineered with precision to deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio that resonates with every beat. Featuring the groundbreaking PositionIQ technology and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker adapts to any orientation, ensuring optimal sound quality in any setting.

**Durability Meets Design**
Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or chilling by the pool, the SoundLink Flex is built to endure. Boasting an IP67 waterproof rating, it can withstand immersion and even floats on water for those poolside parties. It's also dust, shock, and corrosion-resistant, with a UV light-resistant exterior that maintains its integrity under the sun.

**Smart and User-Friendly**
Stay connected with a built-in microphone that offers easy access to Siri and Google Assistant, making it a breeze to take calls or command your smart devices. The Bose Connect App enhances the experience with software updates and customizable settings, all at your fingertips.

**Uninterrupted Playtime**
With up to 12 hours of battery life per charge and a convenient USB-C cable for recharging, the party never has to stop. The compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry, ensuring your favorite tunes are always within reach.

**Wireless Freedom**
Enjoy seamless connectivity with Bluetooth, offering you the freedom to stream music within a 30-foot range. The Bose SoundLink Flex is not just a speaker; it's a statement that you're ready for life's adventures with a soundtrack to match.

**Experience the Bose SoundLink Flex Today**
Don't settle for less. Invest in a speaker that matches your dynamic lifestyle and passion for quality sound. The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is available now â€“ your ticket to premium audio wherever life takes you.

Transform your listening experience with the sleek and robust **Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker**. Designed for adventurers and audiophiles alike, this cutting-edge portable speaker delivers high-fidelity sound that will keep you immersed, whether you're lounging by the pool or hiking through the great outdoors.

**Top Features:**

- **Phenomenal Audio Quality:** Dive into deep, clear, and immersive sound, thanks to the custom-engineered transducer and exclusive PositionIQ technology that automatically optimizes audio regardless of orientation.
- **Built for the Elements:** With its IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker isn't just water-resistantâ€”it floats! Plus, it's engineered to withstand dust, drops, corrosion, and UV light, ensuring your music never stops, come rain or shine.
- **Ultimate Portability:** Compact and thoughtfully designed with a utility loop, the SoundLink Flex is easy to hold, store, and securely attach to your gear, making it your perfect travel companion.
- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Enjoy up to 12 hours of playtime with a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have you back to full power in about 4 hours.
- **Smart Connectivity:** Stay connected with a wireless range of up to 30 feet, and effortlessly access Siri or Google Assistant with the built-in microphone. Take calls and manage your music with ease.
- **Bose Connect App:** Customize your listening experience, receive software updates, and more with the intuitive Bose Connect app.

Whether you're planning a day at the beach or a backyard BBQ, the **Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker** is your go-to for robust sound and durability. Its all-black design exudes elegance and sophistication, seamlessly blending with any setting or style.
